name: Kunkle, Appellant, v. Ford City Borough

judges: Before Frazer, C. J., Walling, Simpson, Kephabt, Schaffer, Maxey and Drew, JJ.
parties: Kunkle, Appellant, v. Ford City Borough.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The lower court clearly reached the proper determination of this casé and its action in refusing to take off the nonsuit is affirmed on the opinion of the learned trial judge.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: C. O. Morris and H. A. Heilman, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Kunkle, Appellant, v. Ford City Borough.
Submitted October 9, 1931.
Before Frazer, C. J., Walling, Simpson, Kephabt, Schaffer, Maxey and Drew, JJ.
E. O. Golden, for appellant.
C. O. Morris and H. A. Heilman, for appellee.
November 23, 1931:
